class.name: GraphEdit
class.brief_description: GraphEdit is an area capable of showing various GraphNodes. It manages connection events between them.
class.description: GraphEdit manages the showing of GraphNodes it contains, as well as connections and disconnections between them. Signals are sent for each of these two events. Disconnection between GraphNodes slots is disabled by default. It is greatly advised to enable low processor usage mode (see [method OS.set_low_processor_usage_mode]) when using GraphEdits.

method.name: connect_node
method.description: Create a connection between 'from_port' slot of 'from' GraphNode and 'to_port' slot of 'to' GraphNode. If the connection already exists, no connection is created.

method.name: disconnect_node
method.description: Remove the connection between 'from_port' slot of 'from' GraphNode and 'to_port' slot of 'to' GraphNode, if connection exists.

method.name: get_connection_list
method.description: Return an Array containing the list of connections. A connection consists in a structure of the form {from_slot: 0, from: "GraphNode name 0", to_slot: 1, to: "GraphNode name 1" }

method.name: is_node_connected
method.description: Return true if the 'from_port' slot of 'from' GraphNode is connected to the 'to_port' slot of 'to' GraphNode.

method.name: is_right_disconnects_enabled
method.description: Return true is the disconnection of connections is enable in the visual GraphEdit. False otherwise.

method.name: set_right_disconnects
method.description: Enable the disconnection of existing connections in the visual GraphEdit by left-clicking a connection and releasing into the void.

method.name: set_zoom
method.description: Set the zoom value of the GraphEdit. Zoom value is between [0.01; 1.728].

signal.name: _begin_node_move
signal.description: Signal sent at the beginning of a GraphNode movement.

signal.name: _end_node_move
signal.description: Signal sent at the end of a GraphNode movement.

signal.name: connection_request
signal.description: Signal sent to the GraphEdit when the connection between 'from_slot' slot of 'from' GraphNode and 'to_slot' slot of 'to' GraphNode is attempted to be created.

signal.name: delete_nodes_request
signal.description: Signal sent when a GraphNode is attempted to be removed from the GraphEdit.

signal.name: disconnection_request
signal.description: Signal sent to the GraphEdit when the connection between 'from_slot' slot of 'from' GraphNode and 'to_slot' slot of 'to' GraphNode is attempted to be removed.

signal.name: duplicate_nodes_request
signal.description: Signal sent when a GraphNode is attempted to be duplicated in the GraphEdit.

signal.name: popup_request
signal.description: Signal sent when a popup is requested. Happens on right-clicking in the GraphEdit. 'p_position' is the position of the mouse pointer when the signal is sent.
